name: Frog Out of Water
description:
Space Frog has crash landed on an unfamiliar planet and lost all of his equipment! Can you find his beloved HyperCannon and get him back home?

Frog out of Water is a short-ish Metroidvania where you must rebuild each upgrade that you find. 

Created for university; the game was created in 4-5 weeks, with the prompt being "Salvage and Repair".

Controls:

-WASD to Move

-Spacebar to Jump

-Aim and Click to Shoot

-Click and Drag to Repair

-ESC or P to Pause

-S to Crouch (when unlocked later in the game)

Programs Used:

-Game made in Unreal Engine 4

-Pixel art created in Aseprite

-Music created in BeepBox

Dialogue font: Digital Disco by Font End Dev (fontenddev.com)

The game doesn't currently have any sound effects but I may add some in the future.

Thanks for playing :)
